title: Hamas release of Russian hostages highlights Putin’s new Mideast stance
description: Moscow and Hamas have stressed that the release of three Russian-Israeli hostages from Gaza was negotiated separately from the pause in combat that was brokered by the United States, Qatar and Egypt.

title: Gaza fighting intensifies as Israel pulls out of hostage talks
description: Some of the heaviest Israeli strikes were in southern Gaza, where hundreds of thousands of Palestinians had taken refuge.

title: COP28 live updates: A potent greenhouse gas takes center stage at global climate talks
description: World leaders address the U.N. Climate Change Conference, or COP28, as it continues Saturday in Dubai’s Expo City. Follow live updates on the summit and agenda highlights.

title: Israel-Gaza war live updates: Bombings resume, casualties rise after pause in fighting ends
description: At least 178 people were killed and hundreds injured in the first day of fighting after a seven-day pause, the Gaza Health Ministry said.

title: Farmers race to innovate as climate change threatens African food supply
description: Scientists, government officials and farmers are reviving neglected crops and boosting agricultural productivity to feed people in Africa.
